container.description: This page allow you to test the extension. This is a page that behaves like a standard page. Enable the extension's features and reload the page to test.
container.title2: Table with a lots of flashy colors
container.indice: (note that the border of the elements is preserved to maintain a certain legibility, when the mode "Increase page contrast" is enabled)
container.testBackground: This is a test of the automatic detection of transparent elements by Page Shadow. If you see this message, this detection is not working properly.
